# Week1
# Using R
## Expressions, Logical Values, Variables, Functions, Help, Files

sum some numbers
```{r echo=TRUE}
sum(1,3,5)
```


rep some text

```{r echo=TRUE}
rep("yo", times=3)
```

compute the sqrt function
```{r echo=TRUE}
sqrt(16)
```

get help
```{r echo=TRUE, results='hide'}
help(sum)
```

get an example
```{r echo=TRUE, results='hold'}
example(min)
```

list files in dir
```{r echo=TRUE}
list.files()
```


execute a script
```{r echo=TRUE}
source("bottle1.R")
```
